title: Smartphone-Based Science Learning Activity Design: Semi-Automated Assembly Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts (middle school level)
context.additional_context: Designing science learning activities accessible via smartphones, accommodating flexible schedules for working learners.

learning_goals: Learners can organize and execute over three science lab activities via smartphone using semi-automated tools
Learners can propose activity sequences aligned with their learning context by analyzing digital learning patterns
Learners can revise/improve learning activities at least twice based on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
